name: ashtech/values
title: Ashtech Values
description: Core values section with animated graphic

default.title: जुनून (Passion)
default.description: Commitment to perfection in every detail.

default.title: संकल्प (Resolution)
default.description: Delivering with precision at every step.

default.title: लगन (Commitment)
default.description: A relentless pursuit of elevated standards.

default.title: विश्वास (Trust)
default.description: Dependability and integrity, embedded in execution.

default.title: निष्ठा (Dedication)
default.description: Every element executed with painstaking care.

default.title: दृढता (Strength)
default.description: Structures and finishes designed to last.
